oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Catch crops and green manures as biological tools in nitrogen management in temperate zones
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Thorup-Kristensen, Kristian
Magid, Jacob
Jensen, Lars Stoumann
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nutrient turnover
Soil quality
Production systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The review deals with the effects of nitrogen catch crops or green manures on the N dynamics of agricultural systems. The mechanisms of their effects are discussed, and it is discussed how they can be used to achieve the agricultural and environmental goals of N management.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Thorup-Kristensen, Kristian; Magid, Jacob and Jensen, Lars Stoumann (2003) Catch crops and green manures as biological tools in nitrogen management in temperate zones. Elsevier, .
